availability.name: Availability Test Alert
availability.description: Triggers when availability drops below 90% over 5 minutes

failureRate.name: Failed Requests Alert
failureRate.description: Triggers when failure rate exceeds 5% over 15 minutes

responseTime.name: Response Time Alert
responseTime.description: Triggers when average response time exceeds 3 seconds over 5 minutes

missingAccessionCode.name: Lab Integration - Missing Accession Code
missingAccessionCode.description: Triggers when more than 10 missing accession codes are detected in 30 minutes

invalidResultFile.name: Lab Integration - Invalid Result File
invalidResultFile.description: Triggers when more than 5 invalid result files are detected in 15 minutes

cpuUsage.name: High CPU Usage
cpuUsage.description: Triggers when CPU usage exceeds 80% over 15 minutes

memoryUsage.name: High Memory Usage
memoryUsage.description: Triggers when memory usage exceeds 85% over 15 minutes

recommendedSeverityLevels.0: Critical system failure affecting multiple services
recommendedSeverityLevels.3: Warning conditions that may need attention

aggregationGuidelines.PT5M: Use for critical metrics requiring immediate response
aggregationGuidelines.PT15M: Standard window for most operational metrics
aggregationGuidelines.PT30M: Use for trending patterns and non-critical metrics
aggregationGuidelines.PT1H: Use for long-term patterns and capacity planning
